data.name: ContractStatusNameCounterpartyChecking
data.value: Checking counterparty

data.name: ContractStatusDescCounterpartyChecking
data.value: When a task to approve a contractual document is sent, the system runs the counterparty check. The status is cleared when the assignment to await checking of a counterparty is completed.

data.name: ContractStatusNameOnApproving
data.value: On approval

data.name: ContractStatusDescOnApproving
data.value: The document approval task is being executed.

data.name: ContractStatusNameOnRework
data.value: On rework

data.name: ContractStatusDescOnRework
data.value: The document is sent for rework.

data.name: ContractStatusNameCorpAcceptance
data.value: Getting corporate approval

data.name: ContractStatusDescCorpAcceptance
data.value: Task to get corporate approval of a deal is not completed. An assignment to get corporate approval of a deal is created.

data.name: ContractStatusNameLukoilApproved
data.value: Getting approval by LUKOIL PJSC

data.name: ContractStatusDescLukoilApproved
data.value: Task to get approval by LUKOIL PJSC was created, but has not been completed yet. In the contractual document card, on the "Conditions" tab, in the "Approval by LUKOIL PJSC" field, the "Required" value is specified.

data.name: ContractStatusNameApproved
data.value: Approved

data.name: ContractStatusDescApproved
data.value: All approval stages including risk confirmation and other stages are completed. The assignment to get approval and corporate approval by LUKOIL PJSC is completed.

data.name: ContractStatusNameRejected
data.value: Contract conclusion rejected

data.name: ContractStatusDescRejected
data.value: Approver completed the approval assignment with the "Contract Conclusion Rejected" result.

data.name: ContractStatusNameSendedToSigner
data.value: Sent to signatory for electronic approval

data.name: ContractStatusDescSendedToSigner
data.value: Signatory receives an assignment to sign the document with an electronic signature within the rule-based approval.

data.name: ContractStatusNameSignerAccepted
data.value: Confirmed by counterparty in electronic format

data.name: ContractStatusDescSignerAccepted
data.value: Document is signed with an electronic signature within the rule-based approval.

data.name: ContractStatusNamePDFSendedForSigning
data.value: PDF file sent to counterparty for signing

data.name: ContractStatusDescPDFSendedForSigning
data.value: The "Send to Counterparty" record appears. The "PDF File" value is added to the "Notes" column. The "Approval by Counterparty" record with a specified return deadline appears.
